hero.title: Brand. Build. Boom.
hero.subtitle: AI-driven websites live in days, not months.

pricing.title: Packages

fast.name: Fast & Simple
fast.tagline: Let the world know you exist.

custom.name: Custom Made
custom.tagline: Custom web apps. No limits. Just results.

pricing.addonsDescription: Enhance your package with additional services

portfolio.title: Clients

footer.brandDescription: AI-driven digital agency empowering small businesses with professional online presence.

meta.title: WhiteBoar - AI-Driven Digital Agency
meta.description: Transform your business with AI-driven websites and branding. Professional online presence in days, not months.

onboarding.title: Get Started with WhiteBoar
onboarding.description: Choose your path to a powerful online presence. We'll guide you through every step.

step1.title: Fast & Simple
step1.description: Perfect for small businesses who need a professional online presence quickly. Get a custom one-page website with branding in just 2 business days.

step2.title: Custom Solution
step2.description: Need something more complex? Let's discuss your custom web application, SaaS platform, or advanced business requirements.

onboarding.help_text: Not sure which option is right for you?

meta.title: Get Started - WhiteBoar
meta.description: Begin your journey with WhiteBoar. Choose between Fast & Simple or Custom solutions for your business needs.

welcome.title: Welcome to WhiteBoar
welcome.subtitle: Let's create your perfect website in just 13 simple steps. Our AI-driven process ensures a professional result tailored to your business.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Complete setup in minutes, live website in 2 business days.

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.description: SSL encryption, managed hosting, and automatic backups included.

smart.title: AI-Powered
smart.description: Smart recommendations and automated optimizations for your business.

1.title: Business Details
1.description: Tell us about your business and goals.

2.title: Design Preferences
2.description: Choose your style and visual preferences.

3.title: Content & Assets
3.description: Upload your logo and business content.

4.title: Review & Launch
4.description: Final review and your website goes live.

welcome.disclaimer: Takes approximately 10-15 minutes. Your progress is automatically saved.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.description: Your session has expired for security reasons. You can recover your progress or start over.

emailVerification.title: Verify Your Email
emailVerification.description: We've sent a 6-digit verification code to <email>{emailValue}</email>. Please enter it below to continue.
emailVerification.resendError: Failed to resend code. Please try again.
emailVerification.checkSpam: Check your spam/junk folder if you don't see the email.
emailVerification.pasteSupported: You can paste the code from your clipboard.

steps.validationError: Please correct the errors above before proceeding.
steps.nextStepError: Failed to proceed to next step. Please try again.

1.title: Welcome
1.description: Let's get started with your business information
1.subtitle: Let's create your perfect website in just a few simple steps.

firstName.label: First Name
firstName.hint: Your first name as you'd like it to appear

lastName.label: Last Name
lastName.hint: Your last name for professional communication

email.label: Email Address
email.hint: We'll use this to send you updates and the final website

privacy.notice: Your information is secure and will only be used to create your website.

2.title: Email Verification
2.description: Verify your email address to continue
2.invalidCode: Invalid verification code. Please check and try again.
2.verificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again.

name.label: Business Name
name.hint: The official name of your business

industry.label: Industry
industry.hint: What type of business do you operate?

website.label: Current Website
website.hint: Your current website URL (if you have one)

street.label: Street Address
street.hint: Start typing your address for suggestions

dataUsage.notice: This information will be used to create your business website and may appear publicly.

4.title: Brand Definition
4.description: Define your unique value proposition and competitive positioning

description.label: Business Description
description.placeholder: Describe what your business offers in one sentence that would appeal to a new customer
description.hint: Keep it clear and compelling - think about what makes customers choose you

description.label: Who are your ideal customers?
description.placeholder: Describe your typical customers (age, interests, needs, etc.)
description.hint: Understanding your audience helps us create content that resonates

value.label: Your Unique Value
value.placeholder: What sets you apart from competitors? What do you do better or differently?
value.hint: Think about your strengths, special services, or unique approach

goals.label: Business Goals
goals.placeholder: What are your main business objectives for the next year?
goals.hint: Examples: increase sales, expand market reach, improve customer service

competitors.title: Competitor Analysis
competitors.description: Help us understand your market by sharing competitor websites

urls.label: Competitor Websites
urls.hint: Share up to 5 competitor websites to help us differentiate your brand

analysis.label: Competitive Analysis
analysis.placeholder: What do you like/dislike about your competitors? What gaps do you see in the market?
analysis.hint: Help us understand how to position your business uniquely

keywords.title: Brand Keywords
keywords.description: What words best describe your brand personality?

input.label: Brand Keywords
input.placeholder: Enter keywords that describe your brand (e.g., professional, innovative, reliable)
input.hint: Choose 3-5 words that best represent your brand personality and values

intro.title: Customer Profiling
intro.description: Help us understand your ideal customers by adjusting these sliders to match their typical characteristics.

left.price: Looks for best deals and discounts

right.quality: Willing to pay more for quality

style.description: What design aesthetic do they prefer?

decision.description: How do they make purchasing decisions?

loyalty.description: How loyal are they to brands?

left.flexible: Switches based on price or convenience
left.pragmatic: Chooses based on current best option

insights.title: Targeting Insights
insights.description: Based on your selections, we'll tailor your website's messaging and design to appeal to your ideal customers.

tips.honest: Be honest about your actual customers, not who you wish they were
tips.typical: Think about your most typical customers, not outliers
tips.adjust: You can adjust these settings later as your business evolves

8.title: Color Palette
8.description: Select colors that represent your brand

intro.title: Business Assets
intro.description: Upload your business logo and photos to personalize your website and build trust with customers.

logo.title: Business Logo
logo.guidelines: Upload a high-quality logo in PNG, JPG, or SVG format. Maximum file size: 2MB.

upload.label: Upload Logo
upload.hint: Drag and drop your logo here or click to browse files

upload.label: Upload Photos
upload.hint: Upload up to 8 photos, 5MB each. Show your business, team, or services.

lighting.title: Good Lighting
lighting.description: Natural light or well-lit environments work best

composition.title: Clear Composition
composition.description: Focus on the subject, avoid cluttered backgrounds

authenticity.title: Authentic Moments
authenticity.description: Genuine interactions and real business activities

celebration.title: Congratulations!
celebration.description: You've successfully completed the WhiteBoar onboarding process. We're excited to bring your vision to life.

review.title: Project Review
review.description: Our team will review your requirements and create a detailed project plan

preview.title: Design Preview
preview.description: We'll create initial design concepts and send you a preview link

revisions.title: Feedback & Revisions
revisions.description: Review the preview and request any changes needed

launch.title: Website Launch
launch.description: Final approval and your website goes live with hosting included

availability.title: Availability
availability.description: Monday to Friday, 9 AM to 6 PM CET

response.title: Quick Response Guaranteed
response.description: We typically respond within 2 hours during business hours

thankYou.title: Thank You for Choosing WhiteBoar
thankYou.message: We're committed to delivering exceptional results and helping your business thrive online. Your project is now in expert hands.

cta.description: You'll receive a confirmation email with next steps shortly

submission.success: Your onboarding has been submitted successfully!
submission.error: Failed to submit. Please try again.

forms.characterMaximum: Must be no more than {count} characters

dynamicList.duplicate: This item has already been added

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address
email.taken: This email is already in use

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

address.selectFromList: Please select an address from the list
address.googleMapsRequired: Google Maps API is required for address autocomplete
